column1: International Marketing with Consumer Psychology - MSc
column5: Heriot Watt University’s MSc in International Marketing with Consumer Psychology delivers a strong understanding of psychological approaches and interventions in consumer-led marketing strategies.﻿This is a unique Masters degree in International Marketing with Consumer Psychology from the Edinburgh Business School at Heriot-Watt University. It delivers a strong understanding of psychological approaches and interventions in consumer-led marketing strategies.This is a Specialist MScThis is a specialist MSc degree which will develop your existing awareness of marketing processes to provide detailed insight into how consumers think, feel and act.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
